website_summaries.verdict: High-quality leather, reliable protection, and numerous pockets make this wallet a top choice for travelers. Its chic look pairs nicely with luggage and other travel gear.
pros: Packed with enough pockets and slots for cards, a passport, phone, and more
Constructed of real leather that has a weathered look, and is available in choice of black, coffee, and vintage coffee
RFID protection is reliable in most circumstances
cons: Snap closure can be difficult to close if you put several long documents in the wallet
Some reports of fraying of the material around the card slots

customer_reviews.title: Carry your documents with you with ease. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great fun wallet & very versitle for man on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Wilson Triviño

customer_reviews.title: Good to have while travelling
customer_reviews.text: I really like the rugged look for the Coffee color. I also like that it has a ton of pockets. I found the pockets for holding the credit cards a little tight to push and pull the cards from. But I guess if they were not, then they could easily fall out of the wallet. Without a pen, the wallet held everything pretty good. But once I put in a pen, it becomes a little difficult to close the wallet but it still closes though.
customer_reviews.author: Ankur

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for solo traveler.
customer_reviews.text: The leather feels durable as hell and looks great. Inserting and removing items is tough since the leather is stiff for now but I can't wait until it's broken in and builds a nice patina. I thought the size/layout was too much at first but it's actually perfect for me as a solo traveler and fits all my cards, documents, cash, etc. Great craftsmanship, stitching looks good, and great work in the small details. Even the two outside buttons have individual leather covers. I only hope the stitching and buttons can hold up as long as the leather after several years. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Torres

customer_reviews.title: Best travel wallet!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this wallet! I travel a ton, and this has been a fantastic purchase! I love the look and feel of it, and all of the pockets are so perfect for all of your travel needs! And if you love a rustic leather style this will be right up your alley. Real leather!
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Leather wallet of exceptonal quality.
customer_reviews.text: Ecxellent high quality leather wallet. Not fake leather. Not cheap leather. Actual beautiful high quality genuine leather. The kind of leather that improves with age. This is a wallet meant to last for a long time. The craftsmanship is artwork. The quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Mo good

customer_reviews.title: Classic design lines and well suited for the frequent traveler.
customer_reviews.text: I go a lot of places around the world. Having a place to keep my most used travel documents, such as my passport, airline and hotel club cards, and other documents is great. I really like the classic style and feel that this travel wallet has. Great as a gift or for yourself. Glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Extremely stiff!
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept of this travel wallet...but...it is very stiff... the compartment for paper money ...your lucky if U could put a dollar bill in it...let alone your fingers to get it out. The slots..extremely narrow... hard to put in or take out a CC. The change purse please Ur lucky if U can put 3 quarters in it. Very disappointed... but...love the concept
customer_reviews.author: ANNIE

customer_reviews.title: Not for the Serious Traveler
customer_reviews.text: Just way too small for my needs. Put in a thick passport with the extra pages and a few credit cards and some local currency for emergencies and you can't close the snaps. It's a well manufactured product but comes up decidedly short in the critical aspect of capacity.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very vice Inexpensive leather men’s carry all ..
customer_reviews.text: I like it -it’s a very worn out look -which I like - looks like it will be a great travel wallet But it’s a gift - so I will let you know If he likes it -
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perectly!
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size, enough room for cards, passport, boarding pass, change, you name it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a safe way to protect my cards, and found this spacious wallet, and knew it was the one! I love it! It holds everything I need it to, securely.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Poor durability
customer_reviews.text: I want to love it and think it would’ve worked for my travel this week but the snap detached first use. Trying to super glue but not sure it’ll work. Disappointed and will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jethro

customer_reviews.title: Good solution for many.
customer_reviews.text: A bit larger than desired, but worth it for all of the functionality. Holds everything I need, even for day-to-day front-pocket use.
customer_reviews.author: JoelD

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet!! It’s a great size, well thought out and great leather! Definitely would buy it again!! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: MOLD ON PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Thought you should know that this wallet had mold growing on the inside. Though upsetting at first sight it was cleanable. The wallet obviously got damp or something in storage.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more worries about my travel documents
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. A must have travel wallet. It holds all of my travel documents so I do not have to worry about looking for my boarding passes or any other documents when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Aamir Khan

customer_reviews.title: I got plastic when I was supposed to get cow leather
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like that it was advertised ad cow leather and it came as poly.
customer_reviews.author: Bettina

customer_reviews.title: Tacky looking
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic looking wallet. I sent it back. Not my style
customer_reviews.author: Mysty

customer_reviews.title: Not real leather. Glued together and broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: This item is not real leather which is reflected in the price. It smelled like chemicals and was clearly glued together as one came unglued as I was trying to put my passport in within a few minutes of receiving the item. Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: fatema shikary

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: So i will find out when a travel later this week. Sure seems like a great quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but trim falling off after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a quality product, but trim around closure is falling off after only 2 uses... not good.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dias

customer_reviews.title: Holds tickets
customer_reviews.text: I am going to use it for travel, and it holds all items in plain view and in one place.
customer_reviews.author: maureen bien

customer_reviews.title: RFID Wallet/passport, document and credit card holder
customer_reviews.text: I love the look, price and size of the wallet. I haven't yet used it but am looking forward to my trip and the "all-in-one" wallet!
customer_reviews.author: KatieKlaus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect everyday wallet when you carry lots of stuff
customer_reviews.text: A great wallet!!! It’s not as big as I thought it would be from the photos, but still wonderful!!! It has pockets and places for everything. The “coin pouch” is comically small, but if that’s the only thing wrong , then I say A+
customer_reviews.author: Kris10

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very attractive wallet. I have not had a chance to use it traveling, so I can’t say how it will work yet.
customer_reviews.author: B.K. McGuire

customer_reviews.title: beautiful leather
customer_reviews.text: I haven't gone on my trip till next week, and I can't wait to use my wallet.. It is secure and all my important things are also secure. I did a lot of research and this holds a lot . If you get this you will be glad
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the brown leather wallet. It has space for everything and the leather is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my 21 year old son for Christmas. He enjoys traveling and liked the size of the wallet and all the pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Real Leather
customer_reviews.text: The Wallet is real leather and came when expected. It's a great travel wallet!
customer_reviews.author: Harry Reinhardt

customer_reviews.title: RFID wallet
customer_reviews.text: Looks good I have not used it but with my upcoming travels i'll need it.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice Bokmann

customer_reviews.title: Cute looks but disappointing performance
customer_reviews.text: I was not prepared for the very weathered look of the brown leather. The leather dye ran onto my travel documents despite the wallet not being exposed to water. Ended up buying a non leather wallet to replace this one.
customer_reviews.author: Big Al

customer_reviews.title: Flight attendant use
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is a flight attendant & uses this for work.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla DiNatale

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for and does everything I needed.
customer_reviews.author: K4K

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallet, it is sturdy but soft to the touch and does not take up alot of space.
customer_reviews.author: REDLADY

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wallet for the price. Only con is that the small slots for SIM card, SD card, etc. are not very functional as the openings are too small and difficult to get cards in/out of.
customer_reviews.author: Chet

customer_reviews.title: I bought this wallet because I love the idea of the SIM holders and that it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet because I love the idea of the SIM holders and that it can fit multiple passports. I use this wallet as my backup and storage for when I'm traveling with extra documents and long trips. The leather is just as explained, very nice and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Luna Lee

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very suitable for business people, you can put a pen inside! The design is also very fashionable!
customer_reviews.author: Chuchu gao

customer_reviews.title: Ok so far
customer_reviews.text: I have just recently started using it. Seems like good quality. My CC slide in and out of the pockets good. I will probably up grade the rating once I have used it for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: John Worthington

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Super amounts of slots. I was surprised by the leather quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, seems well made. Too soon to tell about longevity, not disappointed for price and what I got so 👍
customer_reviews.author: G Llew

customer_reviews.title: Men’s Premium leather rfid protected travel wallet
customer_reviews.text: Great finish, compact and has thought of everything -pen, coin pocket, the lot! It would be to be able to fit a phone but I appreciate it would make it bulky! Really good price quality ratio
customer_reviews.author: Rebeka

customer_reviews.title: The inside pockets had all been torn.
customer_reviews.text: The inside pockets had all been ripped or torn. Definitely was not new -- not sure if this was a resell or what happened there.
customer_reviews.author: Maricruz

customer_reviews.title: It arrived as pictured on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: I can't really say as I purchased this as a gift. But it appears high quality and looks as it did on-line.
customer_reviews.author: Julie B

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: Have all the necessary pockets for passport, airplane ticket, keys, cell phone sim, credit cards, all that you need for have your travel documents.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Fits all your needs.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the quality of the leather and the size. Perfect for traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scratch
customer_reviews.text: I love the arrangement but I didn’t know the leather would scratch.
customer_reviews.author: n

customer_reviews.title: Great Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the best passport wallets i have purchased
customer_reviews.author: Archie Hemmingway

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet it has many card slots and pockets to organize all the things you beed
customer_reviews.author: Nena Foster

product_meta.title: Travel Wallet with RFID Blocking Awesome Passport Wallet Credit Cards Holder Document Organizer Genuine Leather
feature_bullets: BEAUTIFUL LEATHER AND GREAT WORKMANSHIP: made from Top grain sturdy cowhide leather(crazy horse leather), craftwork of the wallet is excellent! DIMENSIONS: Length: 7.5 inches; Width: 4.5 inches; Height: 1 inches, weight 5.99 ounce

RFID PROTECT: Keep Identification-Thief away from you and protect your personal information with inside RFID blocking shield material under frequency 13.56 Mhz, safe your privacy, The anti RFID is terrific.

LARGE CAPACITY: various multifunctional slots, 1 boarding ticket slot,1 passport pocket, 1 drive license(or id card) slot, 1 pen holder, 2 long compartments for bills and document, 1 coins pocket, 8 credit card slots, 1 needle slot for the cellphone SIM card, 2 cellphone SIM slots, 1 camera TF card slot
MINIMALIST AND LIGHTWEIGHT: Travel Wallet with security belt easily carries your passport and other essentials.
AFTER SALES SERVICE: our any defect caused during product production and delivery. We can offer you full refund or free replacement, whichever is at your most convenience.
